2019 Mainstage Auditions

Auditions for the Apple Hill 2019 season will take place April 20, 2019, at Apple Hill Playhouse.

Auditions for the Apple Hill 2019 Mainstage season were held on April 20, 2019. Thank you to all who came out to audition!
if you would still like to be considered for any available roles, please email tstew@applehillplayhouse.org.
